String.string: You've reached the 1st floor of the Engine Room.
Talk to {@LinkCreature:2500#2504#Elleon} and move to {@LinkTerritory:2504#250400051#Engine Room 1st Floor}.
Join Titus and Elleon and follow their instructions.
Find a way to move to the second floor.
Go to Engine Room 2nd Floor and follow Elleon's instructions.
Control and destroy the Core Control System.
You've reached the 3rd floor of the Engine Room. Find Elleon quickly.
Use the Teleportal and move to Engine Room 3rd Floor.
Exit the Exodor Engine Room and talk to Elleon.
